eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk

Class MobileControl2

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk.MobileControl2

  • public final class MobileControl2
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides key constant mapping and methods to access to the LEDs.

    • Method Detail

      • isMobileControl2

        public static boolean isMobileControl2()
        Returns if the app is running on a Mobile Control II or a compatible device.
        Returns:
        true if running on a Mobile Control II else false.

      • setLedState

        public static void setLedState(int which,
               boolean on)
        Turns a LED on or off.

        If not running on a Mobile Control II device this code does nothing.

        Parameters:
        which - The LED, LED_RED or LED_GREEN.
        on - true for on, else false.

      • setLedState

        public static void setLedState(int which,
               int onMillis,
               int offMillis)
        Turns a LED on for flashing.

        If not running on a Mobile Control II device this code does nothing.

        Parameters:
        which - The LED, LED_RED or LED_GREEN.
        onMillis - The number of milliseconds for the LED to be on while it's flashing.
        offMillis - The number of milliseconds for the LED to be off while it's flashing.
